1.content:
It was a good day in the world of Pokemon.
Pikachu, Buneary, Sudowudo, Buizel, Aipom, Chimchar, Squirtle, Staravia, Pachirisu, Turtwig, and Happiny were going to visit Mewtwo, Mew, and Lucario. "Say, Mew," said Pikachu, "I brought the food like you wanted, and I was wondering wh..." He stopped in shock upon seing the massively obese Mew, Mewtwo, and Lucario. "What in the WORLD have you DONE to yourselves?!?" "We decided to get fat, and we love it!" Mew said. Buneary looked at Pikachu, imagining herself and Pikachu as fatties. "Why don't we do that too?" she said. "Meh, why not." Pikachu said. "Yeah!" said Aipom. "It's not like we've got anything better to do today."
1.title: Buneary's Idea

13.content:
"I recommend Sumo School." Lucario said. "Hmmm...good idea." Pikachu said. They all walked down to Mightyena's School. After they all signed up, they all got in their mawashi's. "I feel funny." Pikachu said. "Me too." Aipom said.

Mightyena came in and introduced himself. "Hello class, alright, you guy's decided to come in my class today. So, I have a little special training start off." He pulled out a pokeblock. "See this, it is a special pokeblock I made for all of yall. It'll help you gain 300 pounds. Careful though, too many, and you could end up as big as the three pokemon down the road." He said. "Is he talking about lucario, mewtwo, and mew?" Pikachu whispered to chimchar. "Yep." chimchar agreed. There was 1 pokeblock for each of them. "All right guys, You can eat one." Mightyena said. They all ate 1 and then...
13.title: Sumo School

14.content:
*Hello boys, I'M BACK!!!!*

Charley Zimmer was sleeping in his bed, tired from the active night before. His sleeping however was rudly awakened by the ringing of the telephone. "What now?" Said Charley as he grogily rose outta bed. He picked up the phone and put it to his ear. On the other end was:
14.title: Charley Zimma's Return!

choices: Fat-Mercury (a mineral that makes anyone in its proximity fat).
"Eat Me" Pokeblocks (Fattening and rather addictive Pokeblocks).
The same stuff he used to make Mew fat.
141.content:
"Hey CZ, how're you doing? Listen, some of my friends saw what we did, and they want to get fat, too! Do you think you could come over?"
"How many Pokemon are we talking, here?"
"Well, there's Pikachu, Buneary, Sudowudo, Buizel, Aipom, Chimchar, Squirtle, Staravia, Pachirisu, Turtwig, and Happiny."
"Wow. I'll be right over."
Charley looked at his options on how to make those Pokemon (and most likely Mewtwo, Mew, and Lucario, as well) gain...
141.title: Mew

1412.content:
"Err, listen..." Said Charley to mew on the other end. "...I'm fresh out of the stuff I used last night since pracically chugged it all down." "Oh, don't you have anything to spare?" Mew asked with concern. "Well...I do have some pokeblocks I ripped from a guy in Jersey, how does that sound?" Mew thought about it a moment. "Ok, are they weight gain pokeblocks?" "I really don't know, all I know is that they have the words EAT ME on the side of em, so they must do something." Mew pondered her what she should do. Se looked at her friends, who were starting to look disappointed. Besidesm they were just pokeblocks, how vad could they be....
"Ok, I'll take all the blocks you got!" "Ok, your funeral." Charley then hanged up the phone and began to load the mysterious pokeblocks. Mew, Mewtwo, Lucario and company waited somewhat impatiently for Charley's arival. "Think he'll get here?" Asked Lucario. "Should, I did pay him good for the last time." answered Mew. Just then, coming over the hill was Charley Zimmer, bringing a large load of pokeblocks in a...
1412.title: EAT ME

choices: "Yes! C'mon Buneary, let's get over there and get fat!"
"N-no thanks! Umm, we should just get more tubes so we can all get fat at once!"
14121.content:
The truck Charley was carrying the pokeblocks was no ordinary truck. Not even a semi. This truck was absolutely enormous and looked like it held enough pokeblocks to make all of the pokemon in the group as big as Mew! Maybe even more! *beep* *beep* *beep*. The truck's annoyingly beeped as it slowly backed up to the pokemon. Charley opened the the door and stepped out. "Hey guys, ready for this?" He patted the side of the truck. Mew smiled.

"They're gonna love it" she said. Charley lifted an opening in the back revealing two tubes.

"Alright who do we have here?" he said as he un-wound the tubes.

"Well we have Buneary." Mew pointed to Buneary. "She's the one who suggested this."

"Aw, it was nothing." Buneary said with a little shyness.

"Over there we have Aipalm" She pointed to Aipalm. "He's also seems pretty eager! To his right is Sudowoodo. Next we have..." Mew looked around "Hey, where's Pikachu?" She then felt a small poke on her massive belly, so she looked down to find that it was Pikachu that was poking her belly with curiosity. "There's Pikachu," she said while laughing. Buneary looked at Pikachu with jealousy of Mew.

"Umm... Pikachu?" Buneary said.

"Wha? Huh?" Pikachu responded with his finger still on Mew's belly.

"Your still poking mew..."

"Oh, sorry Mew."

"It's OK. Anyway, we also have Sarevia." Starevia was in the air over the truck so she could get a better view of its size. "There's Squirtle, over there." Squirtle was still staring at the truck with a blank look on his face. "Happiny is right here, trying to climb up me. I don't know if she'll make it. And Chimchar, Turtwig, and Buizel. I know it's a lot of pokemon but it looks like you have more than enough pokebl-"

"Hey what about me?" Pachirisu interrupted.

"Oh, sorry! And Pachirisu is right there."

Charley stood there with a dumbfounded look on his face. "That... That's a lot of pokemon. I only wish I'd brought more tubes for you guys!" Charley lifted the tubes up to eye level. "Alrighty then, who's first? You? Or You?" He points the tubes towards Pikachu and Buneary. Pikachu quickly replied...
14121.title: Big-honkin-truck of pokeblocks

choices: The addictive and fattening Pokeblocks began coming down through the tubes!
14123.content: The inside of the flying saucer was HUGE! It had more than enough room for all of them if they all got to Mew's size, and tubes to feed them so they didn't tire out from using their arms, which would ultimately make them lazier, not to mention "gainer chairs" which included a combination toilet and bidet. The tubes hung into each of the gainer chairs, and a massive orb hung in the air, connected to all the tubes. It was marked "Eat Me Pokeblocks". Everyone sat down. Charley asked Mew if she could connect everyone with telepathy, in case they wanted to stop at some point, or if they wanted to talk during it. Mew did so, Charley flicked a switch, and, immediately...
14123.title: Flying Saucer

141231.content:
*CZ, I'm sorry, but I can't wait any longer! You leave me no choice!*

CZ looked over, as the Pokeblacks began moving down through the tubes to his friends mouths. All of a sudden, he began feeling an intense joy, from them. They seemed to be loving getting fatter. He felt a little left out, but then he wondered what was going on. What was this? And why were they getting so fat so fast? Still, he could tell from the way they were moaning with delight, and the way they were mentally begging him to join, or at least turn up the output, that they were really good... And there WAS a remote control in his hand... And an extra chair nearby...
141231.title: Join or not?

info.brief_description: Sequel "Lucario vs. Mewtwo Weight Gain", particularly the chapter "Mew Mountain".
info.description: A sequel to Lucario vs. Mewtwo Weight Gain, in particular the chapter called Mew Mountain. Pikachu and friends visit Mew's house... and, upon seeing their friends in their current state, decide that it'd be a great thing to do!
